dateOfSleep.description: The date the sleep log ended.

duration.description: Length of the sleep in milliseconds.

infoCode.description: An integer value representing the quality of data collected within the sleep log. 0 = Sufficient data, 1 = Insufficient heart rate data, 2 = Sleep period too short, 3 = Server-side issue.

isMainSleep.description: Boolean value indicating if this is the main sleep period.

dateTime.description: Timestamp the user started in sleep level.

level.description: The sleep level the user entered.

seconds.description: The length of time the user was in the sleep level in seconds.

dateTime.description: Timestamp the user started in sleep level.

level.description: The sleep level the user entered.

seconds.description: The length of time the user was in the sleep level in seconds.

shortData.description: Short data periods (3 minutes or less) for stages sleep logs.

count.description: Total number of times the user entered the sleep level.

minutes.description: Total number of minutes the user appeared in the sleep level.

thirtyDayAvgMinutes.description: The average sleep stage time over the past 30 days.

minutesAfterWakeup.description: The total number of minutes after the user woke up.

minutesAsleep.description: The total number of minutes the user was asleep.

minutesAwake.description: The total sum of wake minutes only.

minutesToFallAsleep.description: The total number of minutes before the user falls asleep.

logType.description: The type of sleep in terms of how it was logged.

timeInBed.description: Total number of minutes the user was in bed.
